item_category: Upgrade and enjoy with the Lenovo Yoga Smart Tab. Ideal for flexible viewing, and for enabling full connectivity to your smart devices. Experience crisp cinematic audio with the dual JBL Hi-Fi and Dolby Atmos. And with a full HD, 10.1 inch display, you have an immersive display with dazzling details. So you can enjoy high quality, non-stop entertainment from your own home.
review_title: Not as good as I thought
Good price for a big brand
Beautiful picture, pity about the Android System W
Easy to set up and use
Just perfect, easy to hold and light weight
Not as good as the previous version
Tap well Disigne and smoth cristal clear srceen
My son love it really good tablet
purchased to replace smaller Lenovo tablet
It's so much quicker than my old tablet
Quick, smooth to run, easy to use
My Lenovo Yoga tab looks and sounds fab.
Bought this tab for my little sister
This Lenovo it's an excellent deal
My new Lenovo Yoga tablet is the bizz.
It's fast and works fine for me.
Very nice piece of kit. Having sorted few problems
Good Speakers, Multiple Users at once.
Great little tablet for the price.
It’s really great I can play loads of games on it
Faster than my previous Lenovo which I had 6 years
Its a sleek tablet and has very good sound.
Great tablet and simple to use
Great tablet, great value for money.
Great for reading and Google Assistant
Nice to hold, good screen image, works smooth.
tablet is great works really fast
Overall I am very happy with this
Very pleased with Yoga tablet, easy to use.
Yoga smart Tab looks smart too
Great design, easy to use and works well
Works well and the stand is a great feature.
My Yoga tablet is as perfect as possible.
Easy to use with the children for there school wor
Second one I have bought this time for a friend
This is a fab bit of kit sounds great design brill
Replacement for my old Yoga.. Improved a lot.
Good price for well designed tablet
Tablet is so smart looking easy to use
Light, Fast , Easy to grip and loud
Good but only for net use , you can't put your own
Easy to use, simple set up - great product
This tablet ticks alot of boxes.
Easy to use and brilliant performance
Great sound. Looks fab. Clear pictures.
A really good mid-range Android tablet!
One of the best tablets i've ever bought
review_text: I truly thought this would be the tablet to have and own?. It feels clumsy in the hand-not so responsive when turning the tablet around-seems to take quite some time for the screen to catch up?-when going from portrait to landscape?. " So far it has bounced onto the floor twice from my computer table" But still manages to work ok. " Thought the stand at the back was rigid when using"?. Does not seem to be. It's not the quickest tablet that I have used-so very disappointed with it so far. Cannot believe reviews giving it 5 stars?.
Everything I need in one place and easy to use
Not used much yet but unlike some budget tablets it seems to perform well and live up to its promises

I bought this for my wife and she just loves it.

It does everything she needs it too and more.
My husband loved it and best price
a fantastic sturdy tablet
Vig great screen, easy to use , comftoble in hand
I bought that tablet and is loaded with great features in this prize range.. Iam very happy with the service.
This is a good price for a big brand but it could be better if you try and push it hard I.e playing a high spec game it will struggle and freeze from time to time apart from that it is a good tablet

The picture quality and Dolby sound are exceptional, however its performance is erratic due to the Android System WebView, which is meant to guard against bugs, but its updates operate very much like bugs themselves, causing crashes of Gmail, Google search engine and other apps. Sometimes requires numerous logins within a few minutes of each other, even when I know from other devices that my broadband and internet are working fine. When it's working well, it's a highly satisfactory tablet.
Bought it because my iPad had it. This tablet was an excellent purchase, really good screen size wise. And volume really good too. Can't complain at all.
It's a great product but didn't realise it came without a sim slot until very late to return it
A little slow when printing OK for home use

High res screen, built-in support for upright or angled display which folds away if not required, great sound (pleased to find an option in the dolby settings to enhance dialogue as I watch lots of streamed TV). Am unsure about claimed micro-SD slot as on my device it looks more like a SIM card slot.
Great service. Nice design, good specs, real value for money
Perfect, for price.I bought this for my Godchild and now I'm thinking to buy one for me

Battery life is good
In portrait view:
On & volume switch at base of tablet??
No touch marks for closing pages, you have to flick the screen upwards
No touch marks for return to main screen, more flicking

Touch left of screen & page disappears
I well happy of this product good price well Disigne to I do like how its  sound of speakers give you amizing expirince  well happy  of it

Really pleased with the quality of this tablet. Built in stand really handy. Battery life seems ok so far. Purchased for streaming films in our camper van and impressed with the picture and sound quality. :-)

The quality of the yoga smart tab is really worth it's money. It's battery life is really good. Also my daughter uses it for drawing and she says it's screen is amazing like the lightning and the pixels the detail is very high quality.
This model is a little different to my last tablet, but I'm sure once I get used to it it will be equally as good
The service was great!Thanks!
My Tablet is very fast,good android system inside,looking good.
Great tablet, we love it!
I just wanted something to Skype on as I have been having some long family calls during this lockdown and my old laptop was getting to warm. The screen and sound are amazing :)

Decent product, an improvement on my older Acer. Slightly smaller than I imagined, be careful with sizes. Crystal clear display. Dolby Atmos is excellent. Battery life is stupendous, but I am not a gamer! Great for music, works well without using the bluetooth. Free standing, metal base is quite sharp, be careful where you put it. Might need some kind of pad underneath. 3Gb RAM is very fast for my needs. Very light to carry, but mostly I need both hands to operate the on/off + volume controls.
Good little tablet, pleased with it. Nice desktop companion. Not a fan of how branded up it is with Lenovo stuff, but good tablet jobs the less.

This was my second purchase of lenovo tabs. I can tell this tab is absolutely grip friendly and cameras are not bad compared to some ipads. I don't like apple. I just like android.. zoom works fine for this 10.1inch tab.
Nice design, good specs, real value for money

This is another great buy from argos .
Simpley great tablet , very happy .
The tablet itself is ok its just the battery that lets it down thats all, I would probably pay a bit extra to get a Samsung tab with a better battery

I needed a simple tablet and the specification for this tablet was just what I needed. Easy to set up - and after I installed a few apps this suited my needs fine. I plug into my laptop to drag and drop files in so I can easily carry the tablet around, conduct my work and email reports from it. I'd recommend a case to protect it if you're using it at work.
It's a splendid piece of technology. The sound is so real you don't need any other speakers to boost the sound. The drawback no USB slot
It's easy to use, with really good picture quality and loud and clear speakers.
Just love my tablet,easy to use.
Very good tablet indeed.

Much nicer lenovo tab than my old one which this was purchased to replace. Very easy to set up Nice weight and like that it has a stand so can watch while doing other things. Google assistant A!. Twin speakers so good sound. but had to purchase cover and tempered glass online so altogether a good bit of kit
I  was really liked my Lenovo tablets I purchased... They were the perfect present to give at CHRISTMAS TIME!
Was gift for hubby. Taking a little time to get used to different operating system from previous iPad. Otherwise fairly happy.
An excellent tablet, easy to navigate, and the sound quality is very good, I have already recommended this tablet to a friend
It's quick and easy to use.the only thing is I think it needs a bigger stand.
Ideal size, bigger than a mobile and smaller than a desktop, the ideal convenient size, rather than firing up the desktop or straining your eyes with a mobile for quick reference.
Excellent quality and value for money.
very smart looking tablet, works extremely well with brilliant sound quality on music functions.  Picture quality is excellent. Very easy to set-up and use.
Significantly better than previous version, though the screen is a little smaller.

Bought this as a Christmas present, so haven't tested it. Reason behind my choice was that the specs were similar with the market leaders and looked better, some of the specs were better and the price was better. Given the 2 years warranty, you can't fault is and maybe is tine to give a chance to Lenovo instead of Samsung or Apple. Preety sure will be perfect for the little one. Merry Christmas everyone!
The tablet is really good!processor running really fast and my son is very happy on his games because dont get stuck!
Great model and easy to use

Bought to replace old Huawei tablet that was slowing down and didn't get on with Google anymore.... this is much faster having a newer Android version. Very comfortable to hold due to the design. Also battery life is much better.
I would definitely recommend this tablet

This was bought to replace my old Lenovo and i have not been left disappointed  its fabulous , picture and sound quality are out of this world and can add whatever apps you like and whats handy is it has its own little stand at the back .
would highly recommend this tablet as really pleased and you wont be disapointed

The positives are the speakers are good. Its a cool form factor and has a built in stand which is very handy.  I have been using it for all my TV - Netflix. Now Tv, etc using  Chromecast.  Slightly heavier than most tablets.   Have had issues with it dropping WiFi occasionally.
Love this tablet. It is very easy to set up and use and for the money is excellent value. Would definitely recommend.
From purchasing to collecting my order was absolutely top notch. No problems whatsoever.
Tablet is very good and functional...bought for kids homework...so serves the purpose...nice design with inbuilt stand. Charging is a little slow but as i  bought for kids so its fine for me.

Got this as whated a good tablet at a reasonable price this does the job nice to hold fast and good battery life good built nice sound Google mode works will got the case to fit it nice fit fast service from Argos well happy
Brilliant Lenovo tablet, easy to use, great colour display, looks good and being able to extend memory with sd card is a bonus. Would definitely recommend.
Best mid range I ever bought. I had windows version 4 years ago and was disappointed. This Android version just works great. Highly recommended.
My little sister very happy with new tablet
Great looking tablet

I ordered this late evening and picked it up the next morning from my local Sainsbury's. After four months use I can can confidently say that this tablet is superb. Well designed with the excellent speakers (which double as a grip when reading in portrait) and very useful stand. After multiple lengthy zoom calls (3 hours +) the battery still had loads of charge left. It's responsive, feels good to hold and well basically great!
excellent product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Great value, this product has really good video and sound quality.
would recommend this lenovo pad very fast and great apps on  easy to set up and the picture quality is fantastic
I bought this for myself, I am in my early 60s and find it is perfect for my use. Easy to set up and use.
Its working fine and fit for the purpose I brought it for.  I liked this particular design with its own stand built in.
I love it. Better than ipad.
After first having few niggles due to previously having Samsung. Now very happy. Good Product well made too. Happy

The tablet is a solid brick build. Very good speakers on that bad boy. The wee stand that flips on the back is very handy. U can even use it to hang it from a wall like a picture frame. The android allows you smoothly set up multiple users which is very convenient. Cons: could use more ram just to make it more responsive. I use it for my uni work and my daughter is smashing Roblox and it's working fine for both of us. I would recommend but wait for promo or slight price drop.
It does everything. Dolby Atmos speakers are fab. Watching movies is epic. Would buy it again
Great tablet for the money, excellent for streaming movies/ tv
I like this tablet because it’s a unique style .

Brought this to replace my wife's aging 1st series ipad, which is very slow to start and was freezing a lot. This Lenovo has an
 excellent picture, is fast enough for my wife's needs and the sound us brilliant from the 2 larger than normal speakers. 3db ram and 32gb storage. A couple of weeks after I bought it, the price dropped by £20. It's an excellent deal.
I love it and there’s loads of room for games that I play

Had this tablet a few months now. Very pleased with it. Bought as a replacement for Huawei Media Pad & it compares very well. Great screen, very clear. Sound quality excellent. Its fast & easy to use. Setup simple. Battery life seems outstanding.
A nice shape to the tablet makes it easy to hold , the speakers are amazing for a tablet. Screen is very clear and easy to navigate.
Excellent value for money tablet, the side hand grip is a great design feature. This is the second one we have purchased and would recommend.
Very good, nice and smart
Very easy to use even if you are new to the internet

I bought this 6 months ago and delayed reviewing it. I find the design quite clunky. Am also very disappointed because I chose this design based on its description of its multi-position ability but it easily topples over. Also there are some websites that default to Portrait position and it's not possible to position the tablet flat in order to look at the screen. It is also quite heavy for someone with wrist problems.
Good design. Poor product as it gone dead in 2days of buying and had no way to charge or switch on. Came to know its a common issue when searched, the product had to be returned within a week.

Bought to replace an ancient Lenovo tablet which was finally giving up the ghost. The picture quality and sound are very good. Performance is more than adequate for browsing, emails, Facebook, Candy Crush, etc. - all the usual stuff. The thicker bottom edge is an acquired taste which might make it awkward to put in a handbag etc. but ideal using around the house with the built in stand. Lenovo computer equipment has proven to be reliable in the past both at home and in work.

Bought to replace my older yoga tablet as it no longer supported iplayer. 
I love these tablets as they are easy to use.
It seems a smaller screen and the speakers have moved but the sound is better.
It does everything a tablet should.

Its a sleek tablet and has very good sound. 
My daughter enjoy using it and l can monitor what sites she is visiting. Remotely
I went for this tablet as the reviews were really good and it has 3gb of ram. Its fast enough for my husband and I. Would highly recommend. The sound quality is excellent.

I wanted a smart, fast tablet with good sound quality. This fits the bill nicely for the price.  It's a fast processor, good sound for streaming TV and films, as well as some  music. Security features such as Face Recognition are great, and already set up for Google Assistant. Slips easily into a bag, and the self contained stand is a real bonus..... ideal for use on a kitchen worktop.
As good as more expensive tablets on the market with no frills.
I am very pleased with this tablet, it does all I want it to do. The screen is a good size, it responds quickly and has a very useful stand which folds flat.
Great tablet that works well
Great value for money -a nice versatile little tablet
good all round value
Nice around tablet for price. Quality video image, easy to use, 32gig is good but 64gig is better for loads off apps and games, all depends on what you use it for.
Very happy with this product has really good sound quality definitely worth the price not had any issues with it
Great replacement for prev lenovo amazing sound  facial recognition no passwords to remember fantastic
Sound quality brilliant easy setup
I havent found any donts just dos buy one there great

Replacing old iPad.   Many excellent features which I'm still exploring.  Not too difficult to understand, even for an old duffer like me.  Don't be put off just because it's not one of the 'big' names.
I can’t say nothing bad about this so

This is a small powerful tab and the sound quality is amazing. The google assistant is also helpful but can be improved. One thing that can be improved is the stand which I think is small and it needs to cover the whole tab like in its precious model.
Great value for money, love the stand that is incorporated in the product
Argos products are good
Great all rounder, great sound and ideal for browsing and catching up on the latest films and music

early days yet but looks fine - my only problem at the moment is getting the tablet to remain in landscape orientation despite me having turned this option off but seeking advice on line this appears to be a problem with not just me - hopefully I will be able to resolve this in due course. Otherwise after a few weeks use I am very satisfied.

Very good design, jbl speakers give you nice sound long battery life. Extra storage upgrade 
Camera give you almost same quality of pictures as phone.
I was  using ipad and I have to say no more apple product.
Easy to use without paying for everything.
Very pleased good clear pictures . Would recommend this tablet
Nice bright screen, great quality sound, fast machine. Bought for my wife who is very critical but she's not said a word so it must be good!

Replacement for my 5 year old and cheap 10in tablet.
A lot has changed in 5 years, so compared to my old one, this one is super fast and very responsive. Still same weight, but able to hold better for long term reading. And wow the speakers are so good and clear.
Overall 15/10
Also fast Argos delivery.
Brilliant. Very fast and good for the price paid.

Bought this as replacement for another yoga tab, and so far it's great, picture nice and clear and has the Dolby Atmos audio. Slightly smaller, but same size screen. There are other differences but so far so good. A good choice
Excellent tablet, great picture quality & fast processing
Excellent tablet, great sound
Very convenient for me checking emails and sending emails reading the latest news stories. I also watch you tube and net flix. Handy light weight and good battery life.
The only downside is that it is heavier than my old Lenovo tablet. Having said that, the display quality is brilliant & the sound is stunning.
So far very impressed with this tablet. The design and speakers are great, and it is very easy to use. We’ve been using it for streaming movies and it works perfectly for that.
Tablet was recommended by my daughter and lives up to expectations.
Perfect for our 12 year old daughters home learning, especially for live online lessons. Once back at school this will still be ideal for homework. Money well spent.
Buy for no other reason than the kickstand which is something you don,t know need till you have one and now would never buy another tablet without one
Excellent value and does exactly what l was looking for. The integrated stand is helpful. Would recommend.

I am not a gamer but my Yoga tablet is as near perfect as possible for me. Quick to charge, longest lasting charge I've ever had. Easy to set up. Quick start up as well. Sound quality amazing for a tablet. Lenovo has won me over with this tablet. I would highly recommend it.

Great design and I love that the stand is built in really useful to hang in the kitchen to avoid spills & splashes. Not sure the battery life is as long as advertised though - playing games seems to use quite a bit. Overall, very good for the price though.

The shape is very comfortable for reading while handheld and the flip out stand. Plenty of speed to run my news apps and the android versions of office. Combined with a compact bluetooth keyboard it makes a small and portable workstation.
My daughter loves this very easy to use and do there school work the stand on the back of the tablet is fantastic for the children
Upgrade from my last Lenovo tablet not disappointed quicker processing worth the upgrade
Good value to the price, have everything my daughter were looking for and was available for next day. Great.
FABULOUS NOT ONE FAULT ...THE BATTERY LASTS ME ALL DAY ..A MARVELOUS PURCHASE HIGHLY RECOMMENDED... TO ANYONE READING THESE REVIEWS GO FOR IT YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED
Fantastic tablet and very easy access to all functions
This was to replace a existing tablet- easy to set up up - seems to have good battery life and is quick and easy to use

This is a bit different from your average tablet. It has two unique selling points - one is a flip-out stand. which is really handy for watching videos. The other is the fact that it has high quality stereo speakers, so you can use it as an internet radio, for example. There is actually a third point - it has the google assistant built in so you can say something like "play gold radio" and it goes straight to that station. Otherwise it's like any other android tablet with good build quality.
Love the retractable stand. Easy to use. Does everything I need for browsing, email and has space for memory card.

Bought this tablet for my son, to replace a really old one he's had for years. It was easy to set up, with clear instructions. My son is so pleased with his new Lenovo tablet - literally couldn't get him off it for days! It certainly feels very solid & stylish. The sound quality from the two speakers is very clear & loud. My son was enthusing today about how great the screen is. The tablet is a novel shape, with the bulbous spine, which he actually prefers. Overall, a definite 5 stars!

Bought this tablet for my wife. Neither of us are techno people so I was a bit worried having to set it up myself because of the lockdown, but it was really straightforward. The design of the tablet is a big plus. The stand allows for various positions and the sound quality is excellent.
Half the weight & half the price of the old iPad, if it’s for every day use it’s great. It does everything my iPad did for me for half the price!
Very good tablet for the price
I have bought three in total. The first I accidentally broke. Then a new one for me and finally a present for a good friend.
This was just what I needed fab design good sound memory brilliant memory card slot can not ask for better tablet everything about it is fab
Exellent design long battery life and excellent sound
Very good working better

This tablet is great, the picture and sound quality is really good. We’ve used it to watch movies on and it really is good. The built in stand at the back is a really good added item to the tablet too.
I definitely would highly recommend this product we’re really impressed with it as a family and the screen size is prefect too, great portable item.
Very pleased with the speed and clarity however the unusual shape makes it difficult to fit a case. On the plus side the speaker 'tube' with JBL and Dolby Atmos has brilliant sound quality.
Very pleased with my new Yoga. Light, compact and fast, lovely colours.

This is the second Yoga tablet I've owned - and this has replaced the first - which was excellent - and was purchased from Argos, around 6 years ago. This model is faster, better graphics and has a more sophisticated sound system - build quality of the casing, is also improved - good looking tablet.
Highly recommend.
Very easy seamless transaction considering the present challenge s of covid

Great little tablet.
Love the design and it is fast!
Good picture quality and would highly recommend.

Lovely tablet and easy to use.  Haven’t used an android tablet before and had no issues.  Smart tablet appearance wise and portable.  Haven’t been able to
find a screen protector or case as yet just for that added security .
Slow and crashes regularly. Good speakers and screen and thats about it

Well designed and excellent price. This was an android replacement for a very old iPad. It was very easy to set up and has a reasonable battery life. Impressed with what you get for your money and the feel of quality. I would only avoid if you wish to use for camera as quality not as good as smart phones but quite ok for video calls.
Lenovo Yoga tablet work great and looks different than the other ones.

A great tablet that is sadly being discontinued by Lenovo. It has a few features that help differentiate it from the endless identical slabs that most tablets are. 
If you're in the market for a tablet and Argos still has stock, I would recommend picking one up. Once they're gone, they're gone!
Excellent tablet with sleek design. I love the kick stand. Nice size. I really like Lenovo. The google assistant feature is quite sluggish but apart from that a good tablet

Arrived quickly and is a good quality tablet. Had to upgrade to Android 9 and there is a little lag when trying to do some work and switching between apps but taking into account the price, this is still very good and better than some/most of the competition. Sound is very good and screen is good too. Enough space on the hard drive but may need expansion at some point in the future. More RAM would be good but as i said before, great for the price.
Great quality & excellent display.
Fantastic tablet! Definately got more than I expected. Worth every penny. Graphics great, sound amazing and am soooooo happy
The faultiest pad ever. Cant describe the frustration it has caused me. Cant wait to return it.
So happy with my lenovo tablet sleek design easy to use brilliant functions and a bargain price it does it all
Lenovo Yoga Smart Tablet is does what it says, easy to use and nice design

Bought this to keep in touch with elderly mother. She loves it. Good battery life, nice and slim and light.. easy to hold or stand. We chose to add add a couple of apps to make the text and app icons bigger for her. . The sound is superb, it's in a different league.
Not as good as yoga 1 or 2 for battery life but easy to use
For the price, it is a very good Tablet.

Was looking for a new tablet and Lenovo has always been a popular brand for me. (Not a fan of samsung and bloatware). 

Anyhow - things that stood out and convinced me to buy: 

3GB RAM 
Octo-core Processor
1920x1200 Resolution IPS screen

All make this operate wonderfully fast and smooth. 

The stand makes holding this easier than other tablets, and gives room for better than normal speakers. Tablet is very light.

Buy the official case for it - definitely worth it.

Excellent for movies
Good for games too
I love the look and feel of this tablet in a world of so much choice.The battery life is good and charges reasonably fast.l got on with it straight away after using my old one for about 4 years.

Picture perfect, sound exceptional, price very good, customer service brilliant. if your looking for a brilliant tablet,and ereader look no further. My grandson has both Samsung and apple tablets (ipad) he certainly prefers this Lenovo tablet to both of his, now its costing me to buy him one the same for his 11th birthday!! Whats nana's for?

I had an old Lenovo tablet and was happy with it, but as Lenovo were not upgrading the security in line with Google Android updates, (no update for 3 years) I decided to buy a tablet with a more up to date version of Android. This tablet is quick, reliable and does a great job for my needs. Battery life is reasonable and better than my old tablet. Sound quality is good. All in all, a nice tablet.
It's incredibly good value. Great screen. Great speakers. Decent battery. It's USP is it's kick stand which is very useful.
Not for gaming. Perfect as a tablet for reading, browsing, movies and YouTube. Incredible sound! Useful stand. I'm absolutely satisfied.
Very quick and easy to use
Nice compact tablet, good clear screen, very good speakers which can be cranked up to a high volume. Good tablet overall, would recommend.

The Lenovo Yoga 10.1 inch tablet does everything I need in the business environment.  It's highly portable and can connect to my data projector wirelessly so it's great for presenting at various venues.  With the right apps, it can accept handwriting and convert it to text.
You can't put your own video s on it only watch on the net, but good battery & works well
Recommend anyone to buy one. Easy to set up and to navigate around. Charges up quickly. Good battery life.

This tablet is perfect for both adults and children, you can set you passwords and profiles and with the option of having apps designed purely for children.
My three year old can easily set the tablet up with its handy stand at the back, can turn the volume up easily and access the apps he wants to play.

The images are clear and the sound quality is excellent, the battery life is long and even after prolong use doesn't seem to lose it battery power.
It also has great memory too.

Lovely little tablet that has inbuilt what others should have... A stand. We're using it for a Point Of Sale (POS) system and the stand makes it "stand out" from it's rivals. The first thing you buy when you get a tablet is a case / stand, well you only need a case for transporting this about, then you can take it out and enjoy it without the case, super tablet.

Since getting the tablet, I've used it on a daily basis & find it simple to use & perfect for my requirements.

Its portability means that you can use it anywhere. I had a bath last week & bingewatched a series & it had great colours, great connectivity & a long battery.

It has the beauty of having the stand or you can use the stand with a hook on the wall, so it can go anywhere with you.

Overall a fab product, the only trouble is that my kids now want one!

After 5 years my wife dropped her old Lenevo tablet once too many times and sad to say it died.
We decided that if the old Lenevo was good the new one must be better and we are not disappointed.Good memory,good Ram and unlike one of the big brands you can add memory via a micro sd card.All in all well recommended...and the best bit I'm in her good books!!!!

design is truly amazing. It offers great stability whilst holding in your hand as well as multiple positioning on your desk and  can be hung. Was impressed with the sound quality from the  speaker system that offers multiple level of sound. I found the touchscreen to be extremely responsive. The picture quality is clear bright and much more than you would expect from a tablet screen. Stylish feel and colour
Works great, long battery life as well

If, like me, all you use your tablet for is emails, internet & streaming tv, you’ll struggle to do better & the price is great value.
The screen quality is amazing & sound is fantastic too. It is quick & responsive and not “buggy” or slow. It’s heavier than it looks but feels reassuringly well made, not flimsy/cheap. The ergonomic design takes a bit of getting used to but does make reading & browsing easier. The stand is a really neat feature too. For what I use it for, it’s as good as an iPad.

Really great tablet, crystal clear display and amazing sound. The shape is a little hard to hold if you're holding the tablet in landscape, but the way you can hang it and stand it is great. Played games and watched videos and speed is great too. Fantastic tablet and has replaced my old one. Access to the Google Play Store makes adding apps and upgrades a breeze. Quickstart guide means you're up and running in no time. Highly recommend.

This tablet has great packaging, gives a quality first impression from the off. The screen quality is very impressive and with the larger speakers pack a bit of a "thump" to the Dolby Atmos compatible sound system. The speakers double as a grab system too so you don't hold the screen and distract from viewing. I used it with a stylus and this should maybe be included as an accessory. The battery doesn't last that long but this could be changed with the settings being tweaked. Great product!

This tablet is lightweight and so easy to set up and use. It has quite a few fantastic features, one of my favourites is the sound quality of its speakers, which are great for watching videos and listening to music, my daughters love that feature too! The other feature which is favourite for us is the fantastic little kickstand, it's perfect for watching videos hands free and for looking at recipes online without getting tablet mucky as it can be hung up using the stand too! The battery is great

This is an extremely good quality, modern tablet with amazing speakers. It is very quick and responsive (4 users have been set up with no noticeable impact on speed). The display is clear and detailed (quality is great when streaming Netflix). It is very versatile to use given the different modes (see photos). The unique design with the speaker bar makes the tablet easy to hold when in portrait mode. I would recommend this tablet even before considering the benefits of Google assistant.

Build quality is very good, a mix of plastic and aluminium. The stand is useful offers different positions can be hung up too. Screen has a thin bezel with crisp display, good colour saturation and the speakers are impressive making this a brilliant choice for media consumption (tv shows, movies) as well as email, ebooks, games, social media etc. Speaker bar is great to grip device with one hand. Fast setup by linking to phone took a few minutes. Built in Google Assistant and Expandable storage.

Brilliant pad! Easy to use and set up especially if you already have a Google account. Very lightweight and great design. Display and sound are really good and the stand on the back makes it brilliant for streaming. Perfect for all uses from reading to game playing has a kids setting so all the family can use and comes with a good variety of pre installed apps/tools. Would highly recommend

This tablet ticks all the boxes, and has been a big hit with my whole family, they are fighting over who gets it next! Easy to set up and operate, crisp graphics and rich colours when watching movies and playing your favourite games, and fantastic sound from the Dolby speakers make it a great all rounder. Links up to our existing smart devices and built in stand/hanging bracket means we can move it around the house and place it according to our needs. A great device, highly recommended!

Great tablet sound quality is excellent 
Good design with built in stand
Screen clear with good battery life 
And benefits from expandable storage 
5 stars 
And recommended

Looks great, much lighter and better sound quality than the previous model, also battery seems to last longer. Like the kids mode with screen time limits and a range of apps to customise it, but this is really best for 6yr and under as interface a little babyish for my 8yr old boy.
Excellent tablet ,looks very good,sound quality is surprisingly good for the size of the dual speakers.

I love this. Loved opening the box it came in, looked rather top notch. I charged it which didn’t take long at all as already had a decent charge on it. 

The bright and clear picture means it’s great for viewing films on. The sound is fantastic with a decent volume on it. 

Love that it can be hooked up, slanted, hand held or supported by itself. 

I think the only downside I have is that I now have to wrestle it off my youngest who has declared its. Definitely 10/10

The Lenovo smart tab looks good in slate grey colour and looks different with the Dolby Atmos speakers built in at the bottom it has a good fold down sturdy stand as well as hanging ability so you can use it anywhere.
Great HD display and clear sharp graphics, has access to Google play store so you can download apps easily.
The Google assistant is very responsive and saves you having to type in search terms. Also has clear crisp sound functionality.
Great tablet with good battery life ,a clear and sharp screen and good audio . All together a good value  tablet .

The Yoga has unusual design but it's worth it, even when hanging it!
The most impressive feature is the sound. Clear & loud.
The screen is good with acceptable colours, connectivity is very good even with cellular, performance is good, battery life is good, the camera is not the best part especially in low light.
It's a really good mid-range tab that will be approved in most situations but not so high profile games or professional photography. Sound makes a winning point for the Yoga.

Overall a fantastic tablet

Picture quality is great, the flip out stand is fantastic and every tablet need one. 
Also has face recognition and has a child’s mode so kids can download and play games without being able to get onto anything that is not suitable. 
The only downside is the battery doesn’t last long.
But the design and quality is fantastic and quick.

Fantastic smart tablet, fast and easy set up. The iron grey finish looks very sleek.  The screen is bright and responsive, full HD, amazing quality.  The vivid colour mode is spectacular.  The camera is pretty decent. The sound is great, I love the way the Dolby JBL speakers look at the bottom.  The battery life is great.  It has Google assistant and facial recognition. I love the flick stand at the back and way prefer the design to a flat tablet.  Has a memory card slot. Would highly recommend.

I am very impressed with this tablet. The rounded speaker barrel makes it easy to hold in one hand.
The positioning of the speakers give some great acoustics, and battery life seems really good.
The screen is very clear, and has a standard android layout.
The USP of this product is the little stand that folds down from the back. I feel this is a weak point on the tablet and could lead to it breaking off if used too much.

I bought this because i have the Lonovo laptop and boy was i not disapointed. This is by far one of the best tablets i've ever bought. Very quick loading up, very stylish and easy to use. Love it. Would highly recommend it.

To highlight, the screen size is 10.1 inches and provides the best HD resolution. JBL speakers, at the end of the tablet (both sides) are fantastic, with excellent sound quality. The C-Type charger is very fast and quick while charging. Battery stands for atleast 6-8 hrs, assuming you are watching streaming videos continuously. The apps performance, speed of touch, screen sensitivity are all highly improved. 2GHz octa core processor. 3GB RAM, Extra SD Slot, and best price.Go for it.
